column1:
I'll avoid that like the Coronavirus then.
This condescending lecturing with fake moral superiority is extremely dull.
Give it a rest, it's over, you lost, time to move on now, or people will just think you're a bitter, bitter man.
If they don't already.

CORONAVIRUS spread from a science laboratory in Wuhan and not a ‘wet market', a group of Chinese scientists have sensationally claimed.
